1370: Yda was born in Walker straet in 1370.
Got married to Ringot at age 27 in 1370.
Gave birth to Ymmekine in 1370 at age 27.
1372: Gave birth to Hilduardis in 1372 at age 29.
1374: Gave birth to Riet in 1374 at age 31.
1377: Gave birth to Flore in 1377 at age 34.
1378: Gave birth to Hardenbernus in 1378 at age 35.
Lost daughter Hilduardis when Hilduardis was 7 years old.
1381: Gave birth to Walwin in 1381 at age 38.
1382: Lost daughter Riet when Riet was 9 years old.
Lost son Walwin when Walwin was 2 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1383: Gave birth to Tielen in 1383 at age 40.
1384: Gave birth to Soeten in 1384 at age 41.
